title: Sejuani
body: So this is a jungler I used to REALLY love playing no matter what the situation was. Tanky, had 3 cc abilities, and a potentially game-changing ultimate, even able to almost one combo squishies with a couple tanky AP items. Now however, I feel like she is one of the worst junglers (Kindred aside) for really anything. Need a tank? Hecarim or Zac. Need large cc in a teamfight? Amumu or the other two mentioned. Want an AP jungler? Elise or Evelynn. She has no place in the meta, and hasn't for quite some time. Fix her please{{champion:113}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: she is apart of the mid season tank reworks
^^^ yep she should be back in meta soon, and maybe with some new abilities...

Aatrox is the real problem. Had a look at his kit that passive is fucked.

It takes way too long to be of any use anywhere. It needs to be lowered to 4 stacks from 5, revive always active or the effect is in combat and not just champs (atleast vs epic monsters like most other champs have), and maybe a 20% bonus ad scale to his w. ðŸ˜‘
